member.name: F:JSBSim.Tests.FunctionTests.log
member.summary:
Define a static logger variable so that it references the Logger instance.
NOTE that using System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod().DeclaringType is equivalent to typeof(LoggingExample) but is more portable i.e. you can copy the code directly into another class without needing to edit the code.
